content.en: Filter design algorithms: Researchers have developed various algorithms to address the design challenges of digital filters. These algorithms, such as the NR-SCSE algorithm and the CSE algorithm, allow designers to overcome problems like high logic depth and complexity in implementation. By optimizing coefficients, reducing adders, and improving common subexpression elimination, these algorithms help in designing efficient and cost-effective FIR filters.
content.da: Filterdesign-algoritmer: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer for at tackle designudfordringerne ved digitale filtre. Disse algoritmer, såsom NR-SCSE algoritmen og CSE algoritmen, gør det muligt for designere at overvinde problemer som høj logikdybde og kompleksitet i implementeringen. Ved at optimere koefficienter, reducere addere og forbedre elimineringen af fælles underudtryk, hjælper disse algoritmer med at designe effektive og omkostningseffektive FIR-filtre.
